The third line, if applicable, of the street address of the pickup address.

Max length: 50 characters

PickupAddressRequestData.description: This type defines the field used to create a pickup address.

city.description:
The city code of the pickup address.

See API for valid city codes.

cityName.description: The city name of the pickup address.

company.description: The name of the company associated with the pickup address.

contact.description: The name of the contact person associated with the pickup address.

countryCode.description: The two-letter country code of the pickup address.

countryName.description: The name of the country of the pickup address.

district.description:
The district code of the pickup address.

See API for valid district codes.

districtName.description: The district name of the pickup address.

name.description: The name of the pickup address.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the pickup address.

postcode.description: The postal code of the pickup address.

province.description:
The province code of the pickup address.

See API for valid province codes.

provinceName.description: The name of the province of the pickup address.

street1.description: The first line of the street address of the pickup address.

street2.description: The second line, if applicable, of the street address of the pickup address.

street3.description: The third line, if applicable, of the street address of the pickup address.

PickupAddressResponsesData.description: This type defines the fields used to specify location and contact information for a pickup-from consign address associated with a seller's eDIS account.

descriptionEn.description: Basic shipping service information in English.

descriptionHk.description: Basic shipping service information in traditional Chinese.

descriptionJp.description: Basic shipping service information in Japanese.

descriptionZh.description: Basic shipping service information in simplified Chinese.

directions.description: This array lists includes all Ship From/Ship To combinations that the service supports. It also includes the type of batteries that may be shipping using the shipping service.

incoterm.description:
The incoterm information associated with the the shipping service.

Supported values:
  • DDP
  • DDU
For implementation help, refer to eBay API documentation

maxLength.description:
This value indicates the maximum length (in centimeters) of the shipping package that the shipping service allows.

Note: This field is always returned, but will show as null or have an empty value if not defined/applicable.

maxTotalLength.description:
This value indicates the total maximum value of the length, width, and height of the package.

Note: This field is always returned, but will show as null or have an empty value if not defined/applicable.

maxWeight.description:
This value indicates the maximum weight (in grams) of the shipping package that the shipping service allows.

Note: This field is always returned, but will show as null or have an empty value if not defined/applicable.

nameEn.description: The shipping service name in English

nameHk.description: The shipping service name in traditional Chinese

nameJp.description: The shipping service name in Japanese.

nameZh.description: The shipping service name in simplified Chinese

shippingServiceId.description:
The unique identifier of the shipping service being retrieved.

This value can be input in the shippingServiceId field when creating a package through the the createPackage method.

ServiceInfoResponses.description: This type specifies the shipping service information.

city.description:
The city code of the ship-to address.

See API for valid city codes.

company.description: The name of the company associated with the ship-to address.

contact.description: The name of the contact person associated with the the ship-to address.

countryCode.description: The two-letter country code of the ship-to address.

countryName.description: The country name of the ship-to address.

district.description:
The district code of the ship-to address.

See API for valid district codes.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the ship-to address.

postcode.description: The postal code of the ship-to address.

province.description:
The province code of the ship-to address.

See API for valid province codes.

street1.description:
The first line of the street address of the ship-to address.

Max length: 50 characters

street2.description:
The second line, if applicable, of the street address of the ship-to address.

Max length: 50 characters

street3.description:
The third line, if applicable, of the street address of the ship-to address.

Max length: 50 characters

ShipToAddressRequestData.description: This type is used to specify the address fields of the ship-to address location.

city.description:
The city code of the ship-to address.

See API for valid city codes.

company.description: The name of the company associated with the ship-to address.

contact.description: The name of the contact person associated with the ship-to address.

countryCode.description: The two-letter country code of the ship-to address.

countryName.description: The country name of the ship-to address.

district.description:
The district code of the ship-to address.

See API for valid district codes.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the ship-to address.

postcode.description: The postal code of the ship-to address.

province.description:
The province code of the ship-to address.

See API for valid province codes.

street1.description: The first line of the street address of the ship-to address.

street2.description: The second line of the street address of the ship-to address.

street3.description: The third line of the street address of the ship-to address.

ShipToAddressResponsesData.description: This type specifies the ship-to address information for a retrieved package.

elecQualificationId.description:
The unique identifier of the battery's electric qualification, which indicates that the battery has a certificate of approval for global shipping.

This value is returned in the getBatteryQualifications method.

fdcSkus.description:
This array lists the FDC SKUs associated with the item. An FDC SKU is the SKU label in a forward deployment center.

Important! Please contact customer service before using these fields.

height.description: The height of the item in centimeters.

isLiBattery.description: This boolean indicates if the item contains a battery.

length.description: The length of the item in centimeters.

liBatteryType.description: If the item contains a battery, this field indicates the type of battery the item contains. For implementation help, refer to eBay API documentation

nameEn.description: The English name of the item.

nameZh.description: The Chinese name of the item.

origin.description: The country of origin of the item.

price.description: The declared price of the item.

remark.description: A remark to the seller themselves.

skuNumber.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) identifier of the item.

tariffCode.description: The Harmonized System code for custom declaration. This value declares the category of the item..

weight.description: The weight of the item in grams.

width.description: The width of the item in centimeters.

SkuRequest.description: This type specifies information relating to the SKU item in a package.

insuranceFee.description:
The insurance fee, if applicable, on the package.

The insurance amount and currency are consistent with the currency of the destination country

packagingType.description:
The package type.

Valid values:
  • PAK (limited weight 2.5KG)
  • PACKAGE (limited weight 68KG)

signatureType.description:
The signature type, if applicable, for the package.

Valid values:
  • ISR (Indirect Signature Required)
  • DSR (Direct Signature Required)
  • ASR (Adult Signature Required)

specialServiceTypes.description:
Any special service types supported for the package.

For example, SATURDAY_DELIVERY indicates that the item is eligible for Saturday delivery.

SpecialServiceDetail.description: This type defines the special service details available for a package.

api_auth.description: The security definitions for this API. Please check individual operations for applicable scopes.
